translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Manual migration

translations.zh-hant: # 手動遷移

segments.source_content: This manual migration process should be run after the [automated migration process](./migration-automated.mdx), to complete the missing parts, or debug issues in the migration CLI output.

translations.zh-hant: 此手動遷移流程應在[自動遷移流程](./migration-automated.mdx)之後執行，以補足缺失部分或調試遷移 CLI 輸出的問題。

segments.source_content: ## Project setup {#project-setup}

translations.zh-hant: ## 專案設定 {#project-setup}

segments.source_content: ### `package.json` {#packagejson}

translations.zh-hant: ### `package.json` {#packagejson}

segments.source_content: #### Scoped package names {#scoped-package-names}

translations.zh-hant: #### 作用域套件名稱 {#scoped-package-names}

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus 2, we use scoped package names:

translations.zh-hant: 在 Docusaurus 2 中，我們採用作用域套件名稱：

segments.source_content: - `docusaurus` → `@docusaurus/core`

translations.zh-hant: - `docusaurus` → `@docusaurus/core`

segments.source_content: This provides a clear distinction between Docusaurus' official packages and community maintained packages. In another words, all Docusaurus' official packages are namespaced under `@docusaurus/`.

translations.zh-hant: 此舉能明確區分 Docusaurus 官方套件與社群維護套件。換言之，所有官方套件均歸屬於 `@docusaurus/` 命名空間下。

segments.source_content: Meanwhile, the default doc site functionalities provided by Docusaurus 1 are now provided by `@docusaurus/preset-classic`. Therefore, we need to add this dependency as well:

translations.zh-hant: 同時，Docusaurus 1 預設提供的文件站功能現由 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 提供，因此需額外添加此依賴：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f2b711c6

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Please use the most recent Docusaurus 2 version, which you can check out [here](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/core) (using the `latest` tag).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

請使用最新的 Docusaurus 2 版本（可透過 [`latest` 標籤](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/core)查閱）。

:::

segments.source_content: #### CLI commands {#cli-commands}

translations.zh-hant: #### CLI 指令 {#cli-commands}

segments.source_content: Meanwhile, CLI commands are renamed to `docusaurus <command>` (instead of `docusaurus-command`).

translations.zh-hant: CLI 指令現更名為 `docusaurus <command>`（原為 `docusaurus-command`）。

segments.source_content: The `"scripts"` section of your `package.json` should be updated as follows:

translations.zh-hant: `package.json` 中的 `"scripts"` 區塊應更新如下：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_4ec2920d

segments.source_content: A typical Docusaurus 2 `package.json` may look like this:

translations.zh-hant: 典型的 Docusaurus 2 `package.json` 範例如下：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3c08ed05

segments.source_content: ### Update references to the `build` directory {#update-references-to-the-build-directory}

translations.zh-hant: ### 更新對 `build` 目錄的參照 {#update-references-to-the-build-directory}

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus 1, all the build artifacts are located within `website/build/<PROJECT_NAME>`.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 1 的建構產出物位於 `website/build/<PROJECT_NAME>`。

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus 2, it is now moved to just `website/build`. Make sure that you update your deployment configuration to read the generated files from the correct `build` directory.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 2 則簡化為 `website/build`，請確認部署配置已更新為從正確的 `build` 目錄讀取檔案。

segments.source_content: If you are deploying to GitHub pages, make sure to run `yarn deploy` instead of `yarn publish-gh-pages` script.

translations.zh-hant: 若部署至 GitHub Pages，請改為執行 `yarn deploy` 而非 `yarn publish-gh-pages` 指令。

segments.source_content: ### `.gitignore` {#gitignore}

translations.zh-hant: ### `.gitignore` {#gitignore}

segments.source_content: The `.gitignore` in your `website` should contain:

translations.zh-hant: `website` 目錄下的 `.gitignore` 應包含：

segments.source_content:
```bash title=".gitignore"
# dependencies
/node_modules

# production
/build

# generated files
.docusaurus
.cache-loader

# misc
.DS_Store
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_efbe5e3f

segments.source_content: ### `README` {#readme}

translations.zh-hant: ### `README` {#readme}

segments.source_content: The D1 website may have an existing README file. You can modify it to reflect the D2 changes, or copy the default [Docusaurus v2 README](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/packages/create-docusaurus/templates/shared/README.md).

translations.zh-hant: 原有 D1 網站可能已有 README 文件，可修改內容以反映 D2 變更，或直接複製預設的 [Docusaurus v2 README](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/packages/create-docusaurus/templates/shared/README.md)。

segments.source_content: ## Site configurations {#site-configurations}

translations.zh-hant: ## 站點配置 {#site-configurations}

segments.source_content: ### `docusaurus.config.js` {#docusaurusconfigjs}

translations.zh-hant: ### `docusaurus.config.js` {#docusaurusconfigjs}

segments.source_content: Rename `siteConfig.js` to `docusaurus.config.js`.

translations.zh-hant: 將 `siteConfig.js` 重新命名為 `docusaurus.config.js`。

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus 2, we split each functionality (blog, docs, pages) into plugins for modularity. Presets are bundles of plugins and for backward compatibility we built a `@docusaurus/preset-classic` preset which bundles most of the essential plugins present in Docusaurus 1.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 2 將各功能（部落格、文件、頁面）拆分為插件以實現模組化。預設集（preset）是插件的組合包，為保持向後兼容性，我們建立了 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 預設集，其中包含 Docusaurus 1 的大部分核心插件。

segments.source_content: Add the following preset configuration to your `docusaurus.config.js`.

translations.zh-hant: 請在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中添加以下預設集配置：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_8d1b00fd

segments.source_content: We recommend moving the `docs` folder into the `website` folder and that is also the default directory structure in v2. [Vercel](https://vercel.com) supports [Docusaurus project deployments out-of-the-box](https://github.com/vercel/vercel/tree/main/examples/docusaurus) if the `docs` directory is within the `website`. It is also generally better for the docs to be within the website so that the docs and the rest of the website code are co-located within one `website` directory.

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議將 `docs` 資料夾移至 `website` 資料夾內，這也是 v2 的預設目錄結構。[Vercel](https://vercel.com) 支援[開箱即用的 Docusaurus 專案部署](https://github.com/vercel/vercel/tree/main/examples/docusaurus)，前提是 `docs` 目錄必須位於 `website` 內。將文檔放在網站目錄中也更為理想，這樣文檔和網站其他程式碼就能集中在同一個 `website` 目錄下。

segments.source_content: If you are migrating your Docusaurus v1 website, and there are pending documentation pull requests, you can temporarily keep the `/docs` folder to its original place, to avoid producing conflicts.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您正在遷移 Docusaurus v1 網站，且有待處理的文檔拉取請求，可以暫時保留 `/docs` 資料夾在原位置，以避免產生衝突。

segments.source_content: Refer to migration guide below for each field in `siteConfig.js`.

translations.zh-hant: 請參閱下方遷移指南，了解 `siteConfig.js` 中每個欄位的處理方式。

segments.source_content: ### Updated fields {#updated-fields}

translations.zh-hant: ### 更新的欄位 {#updated-fields}

segments.source_content: #### `baseUrl`, `tagline`, `title`, `url`, `favicon`, `organizationName`, `projectName`, `githubHost`, `scripts`, `stylesheets` {#baseurl-tagline-title-url-favicon-organizationname-projectname-githubhost-scripts-stylesheets}

translations.zh-hant: #### `baseUrl`, `tagline`, `title`, `url`, `favicon`, `organizationName`, `projectName`, `githubHost`, `scripts`, `stylesheets` {#baseurl-tagline-title-url-favicon-organizationname-projectname-githubhost-scripts-stylesheets}

segments.source_content: No actions needed, these configuration fields were not modified.

translations.zh-hant: 無需操作，這些配置欄位保持不變。

segments.source_content: #### `colors` {#colors}

translations.zh-hant: #### `colors` {#colors}

segments.source_content: Deprecated. We wrote a custom CSS framework for Docusaurus 2 called [Infima](https://infima.dev/) which uses CSS variables for theming. The docs are not quite ready yet and we will update here when it is. To overwrite Infima's CSS variables, create your own CSS file (e.g. `./src/css/custom.css`) and import it globally by passing it as an option to `@docusaurus/preset-classic`:

translations.zh-hant: 已棄用。我們為 Docusaurus 2 開發了名為 [Infima](https://infima.dev/) 的自訂 CSS 框架，使用 CSS 變數進行主題設定。相關文檔尚未完全就緒，我們會在準備好後更新此處。若要覆寫 Infima 的 CSS 變數，請建立自己的 CSS 檔案（例如 `./src/css/custom.css`），並通過將其作為選項傳遞給 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 來全局導入：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_a1af15b5

segments.source_content: Infima uses 7 shades of each color.

translations.zh-hant: Infima 對每種顏色使用 7 種色調。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_0152e600

segments.source_content: We recommend using [ColorBox](https://www.colorbox.io/) to find the different shades of colors for your chosen primary color.

translations.zh-hant: 建議使用 [ColorBox](https://www.colorbox.io/) 為您選擇的主色尋找不同的色調。

segments.source_content: Alternatively, use the following tool to generate the different shades for your website and copy the variables into `src/css/custom.css`.

translations.zh-hant: 或者，使用以下工具生成網站的不同色調，並將變數複製到 `src/css/custom.css` 中。

segments.source_content: import ColorGenerator from '@site/src/components/ColorGenerator';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ab749a12

segments.source_content: <ColorGenerator />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_84f9d7d5

segments.source_content: #### `footerIcon`, `copyright`, `ogImage`, `twitterImage`, `docsSideNavCollapsible` {#footericon-copyright-ogimage-twitterimage-docssidenavcollapsible}

translations.zh-hant: #### `footerIcon`, `copyright`, `ogImage`, `twitterImage`, `docsSideNavCollapsible` {#footericon-copyright-ogimage-twitterimage-docssidenavcollapsible}

segments.source_content: Site meta info such as assets, SEO, copyright info are now handled by themes. To customize them, use the `themeConfig` field in your `docusaurus.config.js`:

translations.zh-hant: 網站元信息（如資源、SEO、版權信息）現在由主題處理。要自訂這些內容，請在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中使用 `themeConfig` 欄位：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_eff3427d

segments.source_content: #### `headerIcon`, `headerLinks` {#headericon-headerlinks}

translations.zh-hant: #### `headerIcon`, `headerLinks` {#headericon-headerlinks}

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus 1, header icon and header links were root fields in `siteConfig`:

translations.zh-hant: 在 Docusaurus 1 中，標題圖標和標題連結是 `siteConfig` 的根欄位：

segments.source_content:
```js title="siteConfig.js"
headerIcon: 'img/docusaurus.svg',
headerLinks: [
  { doc: "doc1", label: "Getting Started" },
  { page: "help", label: "Help" },
  { href: "https://github.com/", label: "GitHub" },
  { blog: true, label: "Blog" },
],
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_9d31dc8f

segments.source_content: Now, these two fields are both handled by the theme:

translations.zh-hant: 現在，這兩個欄位都由主題處理：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_fc50cfb2

segments.source_content: #### `algolia` {#algolia}

translations.zh-hant: #### `algolia` {#algolia}
@@untranslatable_placeholder_37cbaa50

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Your Algolia DocSearch v1 config (found [here](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch-configs/blob/master/configs)) should be updated for Docusaurus v2 ([example](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch-configs/tree/master/configs/docusaurus-2.json)).

You can contact the DocSearch team (@shortcuts, @s-pace) for support. They can update it for you and trigger a recrawl of your site to restore the search (otherwise you will have to wait up to 24h for the next scheduled crawl)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

您的 Algolia DocSearch v1 配置（可在[此處](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch-configs/blob/master/configs)找到）需要針對 Docusaurus v2 進行更新（[範例](https://github.com/algolia/docsearch-configs/tree/master/configs/docusaurus-2.json)）。

您可以聯繫 DocSearch 團隊（@shortcuts, @s-pace）尋求支援。他們可以為您更新配置並觸發重新爬取網站以恢復搜索功能（否則您可能需要等待最多 24 小時直到下一次計劃爬取）。

:::

segments.source_content: #### `blogSidebarCount` {#blogsidebarcount}

translations.zh-hant: #### `blogSidebarCount` {#blogsidebarcount}

segments.source_content: Deprecated. Pass it as a blog option to `@docusaurus/preset-classic` instead:

translations.zh-hant: 已棄用。請將其作為部落格選項傳遞給 `@docusaurus/preset-classic`：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_7a5ad31f

segments.source_content: #### `cname` {#cname}

translations.zh-hant: #### `cname` {#cname}

segments.source_content: Deprecated. Create a `CNAME` file in your `static` folder instead with your custom domain. Files in the `static` folder will be copied into the root of the `build` folder during execution of the build command.

translations.zh-hant: 已棄用。請改為在 `static` 資料夾中創建一個 `CNAME` 檔案，並填入您的自訂網域。執行建置命令時，`static` 資料夾中的檔案將被複製到 `build` 資料夾的根目錄中。

segments.source_content: #### `customDocsPath`, `docsUrl`, `editUrl`, `enableUpdateBy`, `enableUpdateTime` {#customdocspath-docsurl-editurl-enableupdateby-enableupdatetime}

translations.zh-hant: #### `customDocsPath`, `docsUrl`, `editUrl`, `enableUpdateBy`, `enableUpdateTime` {#customdocspath-docsurl-editurl-enableupdateby-enableupdatetime}

segments.source_content: **BREAKING**: `editUrl` should point to (website) Docusaurus project instead of `docs` directory.

translations.zh-hant: **重大變更**：`editUrl` 現在應指向（網站）Docusaurus 專案，而非 `docs` 目錄。

segments.source_content: Deprecated. Pass it as an option to `@docusaurus/preset-classic` docs instead:

translations.zh-hant: 已棄用。請改為將其作為選項傳遞給 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 的 docs 設定：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ebf9dda2

segments.source_content: #### `gaTrackingId` {#gatrackingid}

translations.zh-hant: #### `gaTrackingId` {#gatrackingid}
@@untranslatable_placeholder_d14a389e

segments.source_content: #### `gaGtag` {#gagtag}

translations.zh-hant: #### `gaGtag` {#gagtag}
@@untranslatable_placeholder_fb74007a

segments.source_content: ### Removed fields {#removed-fields}

translations.zh-hant: ### 已移除的欄位 {#removed-fields}

segments.source_content: The following fields are all deprecated, you may remove from your configuration file.

translations.zh-hant: 以下欄位均已棄用，您可以從設定檔中移除。

segments.source_content:
- `blogSidebarTitle`
- `cleanUrl` - Clean URL is used by default now.
- `defaultVersionShown` - Versioning is not ported yet. You'd be unable to migration to Docusaurus 2 if you are using versioning. Stay tuned.
- `disableHeaderTitle`
- `disableTitleTagline`
- `docsSideNavCollapsible` is available at `docsPluginOptions.sidebarCollapsible`, and this is turned on by default now.
- `facebookAppId`
- `facebookComments`
- `facebookPixelId`
- `fonts`
- `highlight` - We now use [Prism](https://prismjs.com/) instead of [highlight.js](https://highlightjs.org/).
- `markdownOptions` - We use MDX in v2 instead of Remarkable. Your Markdown options have to be converted to Remark/Rehype plugins.
- `markdownPlugins` - We use MDX in v2 instead of Remarkable. Your Markdown plugins have to be converted to Remark/Rehype plugins.
- `manifest`
- `onPageNav` - This is turned on by default now.
- `separateCss` - It can imported in the same manner as `custom.css` mentioned above.
- `scrollToTop`
- `scrollToTopOptions`
- `translationRecruitingLink`
- `twitter`
- `twitterUsername`
- `useEnglishUrl`
- `users`
- `usePrism` - We now use [Prism](https://prismjs.com/) instead of [highlight.js](https://highlightjs.org/)
- `wrapPagesHTML`

translations.zh-hant:
- `blogSidebarTitle`
- `cleanUrl` - 現在預設使用簡潔 URL。
- `defaultVersionShown` - 版本功能尚未移植。如果您使用版本功能，將無法遷移至 Docusaurus 2。請持續關注。
- `disableHeaderTitle`
- `disableTitleTagline`
- `docsSideNavCollapsible` 現在可在 `docsPluginOptions.sidebarCollapsible` 中設定，且預設為開啟。
- `facebookAppId`
- `facebookComments`
- `facebookPixelId`
- `fonts`
- `highlight` - 我們現在使用 [Prism](https://prismjs.com/) 而非 [highlight.js](https://highlightjs.org/)。
- `markdownOptions` - v2 使用 MDX 而非 Remarkable。您的 Markdown 選項需轉換為 Remark/Rehype 插件。
- `markdownPlugins` - v2 使用 MDX 而非 Remarkable。您的 Markdown 插件需轉換為 Remark/Rehype 插件。
- `manifest`
- `onPageNav` - 此功能現在預設為開啟。
- `separateCss` - 可以像上述 `custom.css` 一樣導入。
- `scrollToTop`
- `scrollToTopOptions`
- `translationRecruitingLink`
- `twitter`
- `twitterUsername`
- `useEnglishUrl`
- `users`
- `usePrism` - 我們現在使用 [Prism](https://prismjs.com/) 而非 [highlight.js](https://highlightjs.org/)。
- `wrapPagesHTML`

segments.source_content: We intend to implement many of the deprecated config fields as plugins in future. Help will be appreciated!

translations.zh-hant: 我們計劃在未來將許多已棄用的設定欄位實現為插件。歡迎貢獻！

segments.source_content: ## Urls {#urls}

translations.zh-hant: ## 網址 {#urls}

segments.source_content: In v1, all pages were available with or without the `.html` extension.

translations.zh-hant: 在 v1 中，所有頁面均可透過帶或不帶 `.html` 副檔名的網址存取。

segments.source_content: For example, these 2 pages exist:

translations.zh-hant: 例如，以下兩個頁面同時存在：

segments.source_content:
- [`https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation`](https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation)
- [`https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation.html`](https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation.html)

translations.zh-hant:
- [`https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation`](https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation)
- [`https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation.html`](https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/installation.html)

segments.source_content: If [`cleanUrl`](https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/site-config#cleanurl-boolean) was:

translations.zh-hant: 如果 [`cleanUrl`](https://v1.docusaurus.io/docs/en/site-config#cleanurl-boolean) 設定為：

segments.source_content:
- `true`: links would target `/installation`
- `false`: links would target `/installation.html`

translations.zh-hant:
- `true`：連結將指向 `/installation`
- `false`：連結將指向 `/installation.html`

segments.source_content: In v2, by default, the canonical page is `/installation`, and not `/installation.html`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 v2 中，預設情況下，規範頁面是 `/installation`，而非 `/installation.html`。

segments.source_content: If you had `cleanUrl: false` in v1, it's possible that people published links to `/installation.html`.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您在 v1 中設定 `cleanUrl: false`，可能有人已發布指向 `/installation.html` 的連結。

segments.source_content: For SEO reasons, and avoiding breaking links, you should configure server-side redirect rules on your hosting provider.

translations.zh-hant: 為了 SEO 並避免連結失效，您應在託管服務商設定伺服器端重新導向規則。

segments.source_content: As an escape hatch, you could use [@docusaurus/plugin-client-redirects](../../api/plugins/plugin-client-redirects.mdx) to create client-side redirects from `/installation.html` to `/installation`.

translations.zh-hant: 作為應急方案，您可以使用 [@docusaurus/plugin-client-redirects](../../api/plugins/plugin-client-redirects.mdx) 創建從 `/installation.html` 到 `/installation` 的客戶端重新導向。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_a320d8a8

segments.source_content: If you want to keep the `.html` extension as the canonical URL of a page, docs can declare a `slug: installation.html` front matter.

translations.zh-hant: 若想保留 `.html` 副檔名作為頁面的標準網址，可在文件 front matter 中宣告 `slug: installation.html`。

segments.source_content: ## Components {#components}

translations.zh-hant: ## 元件 {#components}

segments.source_content: ### Sidebar {#sidebar}

translations.zh-hant: ### 側邊欄 {#sidebar}

segments.source_content: In previous version, nested sidebar category is not allowed and sidebar category can only contain doc ID. However, v2 allows infinite nested sidebar and we have many types of [Sidebar Item](../../guides/docs/sidebar/items.mdx) other than document.

translations.zh-hant: 舊版本不允許嵌套側邊欄分類，且分類僅能包含文件 ID。而 v2 版本支援無限嵌套側邊欄，並提供多種[側邊欄項目類型](../../guides/docs/sidebar/items.mdx)（不限於文件）。

segments.source_content: You'll have to migrate your sidebar if it contains category type. Rename `subcategory` to `category` and `ids` to `items`.

translations.zh-hant: 若側邊欄包含分類類型需進行遷移：將 `subcategory` 更名為 `category`，`ids` 更名為 `items`。

segments.source_content:
```diff title="sidebars.json"
{
- type: 'subcategory',
+ type: 'category',
  label: 'My Example Subcategory',
+ items: ['doc1'],
- ids: ['doc1']
},
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_86aac3bf

segments.source_content: ### Footer {#footer}

translations.zh-hant: ### 頁尾 {#footer}

segments.source_content: `website/core/Footer.js` is no longer needed. If you want to modify the default footer provided by Docusaurus, [swizzle](../../swizzling.mdx) it:

translations.zh-hant: 不再需要 `website/core/Footer.js`。若要修改 Docusaurus 預設頁尾，請透過[替換元件](../../swizzling.mdx)實現：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic Footer
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_09e58fc0

segments.source_content: This will copy the current `<Footer />` component used by the theme to a `src/theme/Footer` directory under the root of your site, you may then edit this component for customization.

translations.zh-hant: 此操作會將當前主題使用的 `<Footer />` 元件複製到網站根目錄下的 `src/theme/Footer` 資料夾，後續可編輯此元件進行客製化。

segments.source_content: Do not swizzle the Footer just to add the logo on the left. The logo is intentionally removed in v2 and moved to the bottom. Just configure the footer in `docusaurus.config.js` with `themeConfig.footer`:

translations.zh-hant: 請勿僅為在左側添加標誌而替換頁尾元件。v2 版本已刻意移除左側標誌並移至底部，請直接在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中透過 `themeConfig.footer` 配置：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b6fff5fe

segments.source_content: ### Pages {#pages}

translations.zh-hant: ### 頁面 {#pages}

segments.source_content: Please refer to [creating pages](guides/creating-pages.mdx) to learn how Docusaurus 2 pages work. After reading that, notice that you have to move `pages/en` files in v1 to `src/pages` instead.

translations.zh-hant: 請參閱[建立頁面](guides/creating-pages.mdx)了解 Docusaurus 2 頁面運作機制。閱讀後請注意：需將 v1 的 `pages/en` 檔案移至 `src/pages`。

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus v1, pages received the `siteConfig` object as props.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v1 的頁面會接收 `siteConfig` 物件作為 props。

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus v2, get the `siteConfig` object from `useDocusaurusContext` instead.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v2 需改從 `useDocusaurusContext` 獲取 `siteConfig` 物件。

segments.source_content: In v2, you have to apply the theme layout around each page. The Layout component takes metadata props.

translations.zh-hant: v2 版本需在每個頁面套用主題佈局。Layout 元件會接收 metadata props。

segments.source_content: `CompLibrary` is deprecated in v2, so you have to write your own React component or use Infima styles (Docs will be available soon, sorry about that! In the meanwhile, inspect the V2 website or view https://infima.dev/ to see what styles are available).

translations.zh-hant: v2 已棄用 `CompLibrary`，需自行編寫 React 元件或使用 Infima 樣式（相關文件即將推出，敬請見諒！期間可檢查 V2 網站或查看 https://infima.dev/ 了解可用樣式）。

segments.source_content: You can migrate CommonJS to ES6 imports/exports.

translations.zh-hant: 可將 CommonJS 遷移至 ES6 的 import/export 語法。

segments.source_content: Here's a typical Docusaurus v2 page:

translations.zh-hant: 以下是典型的 Docusaurus v2 頁面範例：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_6ed66131

segments.source_content: The following code could be helpful for migration of various pages:

translations.zh-hant: 以下程式碼有助於各類頁面遷移：

segments.source_content:
- Index page - [Flux](https://github.com/facebook/flux/blob/master/website/src/pages/index.js/) (recommended), [Docusaurus 2](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/website/src/pages/index.js/), [Hermes](https://github.com/facebook/hermes/blob/main/website/src/pages/index.js/)
- Help/Support page - [Docusaurus 2](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/website/src/pages/help.js/), [Flux](http://facebook.github.io/flux/support)

translations.zh-hant:
- 首頁 - [Flux](https://github.com/facebook/flux/blob/master/website/src/pages/index.js/)（推薦）、[Docusaurus 2](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/website/src/pages/index.js/)、[Hermes](https://github.com/facebook/hermes/blob/main/website/src/pages/index.js/)
- 幫助/支援頁面 - [Docusaurus 2](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/blob/main/website/src/pages/help.js/)、[Flux](http://facebook.github.io/flux/support)

segments.source_content: ## Content {#content}

translations.zh-hant: ## 內容 {#content}

segments.source_content: ### Replace AUTOGENERATED_TABLE_OF_CONTENTS {#replace-autogenerated_table_of_contents}

translations.zh-hant: ### 替換 AUTOGENERATED_TABLE_OF_CONTENTS {#replace-autogenerated_table_of_contents}

segments.source_content: This feature is replaced by [inline table of content](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-toc.mdx#inline-table-of-contents)

translations.zh-hant: 此功能已被[行內目錄](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-toc.mdx#inline-table-of-contents)取代

segments.source_content: ### Update Markdown syntax to be MDX-compatible {#update-markdown-syntax-to-be-mdx-compatible}

translations.zh-hant: ### 將 Markdown 語法更新為 MDX 相容格式 {#update-markdown-syntax-to-be-mdx-compatible}

segments.source_content:
In Docusaurus 2, the Markdown syntax has been changed to [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/). Hence there might be some broken syntax in the existing docs which you would have to update. A common example is self-closing tags like `` and `
` which are valid in HTML would have to be explicitly closed now ( `` and `
`). All tags in MDX documents have to be valid JSX.

translations.zh-hant:
Docusaurus 2 已將 Markdown 語法改為 [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)，因此現有文件可能需修正不相容語法。常見範例如：HTML 中有效的自閉合標籤 `` 和 `
`，現需明確閉合為 `` 和 `
`。MDX 文件中的所有標籤都必須符合 JSX 規範。

segments.source_content: Front matter is parsed by [gray-matter](https://github.com/jonschlinkert/gray-matter). If your front matter use special characters like `:`, you now need to quote it: `title: Part 1: my part1 title` → `title: "Part 1: my part1 title"`.

translations.zh-hant: Front matter 由 [gray-matter](https://github.com/jonschlinkert/gray-matter) 解析。若您的 front matter 包含特殊字符（如 `:`），現在需加上引號：`title: Part 1: my part1 title` → `title: "Part 1: my part1 title"`。

segments.source_content: **Tips**: You might want to use some online tools like [HTML to JSX](https://transform.tools/html-to-jsx) to make the migration easier.

translations.zh-hant: **提示**：您可使用 [HTML 轉 JSX](https://transform.tools/html-to-jsx) 等線上工具簡化遷移流程。

segments.source_content: ### Language-specific code tabs {#language-specific-code-tabs}

translations.zh-hant: ### 語言專屬程式碼分頁 {#language-specific-code-tabs}

segments.source_content: Refer to the [multi-language support code blocks](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#multi-language-support-code-blocks) section.

translations.zh-hant: 請參閱[多語言支援程式碼區塊](../../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#multi-language-support-code-blocks)章節。

segments.source_content: ### Front matter {#front-matter}

translations.zh-hant: ### Front matter {#front-matter}

segments.source_content: The Docusaurus front matter fields for the blog have been changed from camelCase to snake_case to be consistent with the docs.

translations.zh-hant: 部落格的 Docusaurus front matter 欄位已從駝峰式命名改為蛇形命名，以與文件保持一致。

segments.source_content: The fields `authorFBID` and `authorTwitter` have been deprecated. They are only used for generating the profile image of the author which can be done via the `authors` field.

translations.zh-hant: 欄位 `authorFBID` 與 `authorTwitter` 已被棄用。這些欄位僅用於生成作者頭像，現可透過 `authors` 欄位實現相同功能。

segments.source_content: ## Deployment {#deployment}

translations.zh-hant: ## 部署 {#deployment}

segments.source_content: The `CNAME` file used by GitHub Pages is not generated anymore, so be sure you have created it in `/static/CNAME` if you use a custom domain.

translations.zh-hant: GitHub Pages 使用的 `CNAME` 檔案不再自動生成，若使用自訂網域，請確保已建立於 `/static/CNAME`。

segments.source_content: The blog RSS feed is now hosted at `/blog/rss.xml` instead of `/blog/feed.xml`. You may want to configure server-side redirects so that users' subscriptions keep working.

translations.zh-hant: 部落格 RSS 訂閱位址變更為 `/blog/rss.xml`（原為 `/blog/feed.xml`）。建議設定伺服器端重新導向，以維持使用者訂閱有效性。

segments.source_content: ## Test your site {#test-your-site}

translations.zh-hant: ## 測試網站 {#test-your-site}

segments.source_content: After migration, your folder structure should look like this:

translations.zh-hant: 遷移完成後，目錄結構應如下所示：

segments.source_content:
```bash
my-project
├── docs
└── website
    ├── blog
    ├── src
    │   ├── css
    │   │   └── custom.css
    │   └── pages
    │       └── index.js
    ├── package.json
    ├── sidebars.json
    ├── .gitignore
    ├── docusaurus.config.js
    └── static
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c7a2b8ea

segments.source_content: Start the development server and fix any errors:

translations.zh-hant: 啟動開發伺服器並修正錯誤：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
cd website
npm start
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c2af46bc

segments.source_content: You can also try to build the site for production:

translations.zh-hant: 您亦可嘗試建置正式環境版本：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run build
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_dd286a16
